page.title: 14The Housing Market, Rutland
page.content: Ridlington, Preston and Ayston are located in a rural, undeveloped area of Leicestershire with easy access to leisure activities such as fishing,sailing and walking.There are good commuting possibilities for Leicester and Peterbough.The villages contain a mixture of older ironstone houses and more modern council houses The older ,more traditional houses in the villages seem to be in greater demand and tend to fetch higher prices.The following are some examples of houses on the market in May 1985: in Ridlington a detached,three bedroomed house cost Â£48,750,while a rebuilt seventeenth century three bedroomed house cost Â£85,000.
